name: coop-map-directory-index
description: The Map/Directory/Index component of the Platform Cooperative Development Kit.

scripts.clean: rm -rf maps/static/maps/dist && mkdir -p maps/static/maps/dist/js && mkdir -p maps/static/maps/dist/css && mkdir -p maps/static/maps/dist/fonts && mkdir -p maps/static/maps/dist/images
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [ babelify ] -t envify maps/static/maps/js/index.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -o maps/static/maps/dist/js/site.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify -t [ babelify ] -t envify maps/static/maps/js/index.js -o 'exorcist maps/static/maps/dist/js/site.js.map > maps/static/maps/dist/js/site.js' -dv
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:images && npm run build:css && concurrently --raw "npm run watch:lint" "npm run watch:babel" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:babel" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:css" "npm run copy:fonts" "npm run copy:images" && npm run optimize
scripts.dev: concurrently --raw "./manage.py runserver" "npm run watch" "npm run dev:browser-sync"

author: Eric Theise
